1.title: Dog & hot rod
1.plot: Prankster sam carjacks his girlfriend corall to give her motor the ultimate fluffy makeover, and lenny wants to get one over on bossy sister priscilla by sending her car up in flames.

2.title: Cat & camera
2.plot: Charley gives boyfriend can the fright of his life when she turns his pride and joy into a purring automobile, and laura carjacks bessie mate jack to give him the picture perfect car of his dreams.

3.title: Ice skate & pink fashion
3.plot: Travis finally gets one over on younger brother remone by giving his car an ice-cool makeover, and sue treats daughter imani by transforming her motor into the ultimate fashion accessory.

4.title: Chicken nugget & cow
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: Cupcake & football
5.plot: Lewis cooks up a surprise car transformation for girlfriend amie that he hopes will be so good she'll want to eat it, and danielle treats her football-mad dad paul to a match-winning motor makeover.

6.title: Party & space shuttle
6.plot: Ben risks life and limb by stealing best mate lauren's car behind her back to give it a glittery new look. Becky surprises space-mad boyfriend jake with a car transformation that's out of this world.

7.title: Gatsby & moroccan ambulance
7.plot: Brittany carjacks her fashionista sister kimberley with the help of friend michael but can't agree on the design. Nicola tries to transform the ambulance she took from charity workers nils and jaz.

8.title: Zombie & butterfly
8.plot: Archie surprises strongman and gym buddy adam with a new car that he hopes can survive the apocalypse, while ruby treats her butterfly-mad mum kay to a motor makeover she'll never forget.

9.title: Jungle & mermaid
9.plot: Neela arranges a big surprise for boyfriend louis by giving his car a jungle-themed makeover, while jojo spruces up her cousin nathan's van by getting it a new look, both inside and out.

10.title: Queenie & ibiza
10.plot: Kelly gives the car of her dog-mad mum josie an overhaul to match her favourite pooch, while antoine surprises his mate joe with a musical vehicle makeover with a difference.

11.title: Ghostbusters & sudoku
11.plot: Dominic surprises his film-loving brother patrick with a van makeover worthy of an oscar. Accountant dennis can't compute how his sister kimmy got away with turning his motor into a number cruncher.

12.title: Frisbee & lipstick
12.plot: Ben pranks his ultimate frisbee-playing mate rory and gives his car a transformation that leaves him in a spin, while harry surprises his girlfriend tabitha with a makeup makeover.

13.title: Magic & beach
13.plot: Magic man bill.i.am steals martyn's practical van and pulls a magical makeover out of the hat, while dean nicks his mum debbie's car and adds a little sunshine to it.

imdb.title: Carjackers
plot: People secretly pinch cars belonging to friends and family to surprise them with a shock makeover from the carjackers team - matt, sophie, rob and their crew of vehicle experts and modifiers.
